MainPantrySpringCrops.Description: Choose between twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted).
MainPantrySpringCrops.AllowValues: twistA, liteA, plusA, twistB, liteB, plusB, false

MainPantrySummerCrops.Description: Choose between twistA1, twistA2, liteA1, liteA2, plusA1, plusA2, twistB1, twistB2, liteB1, liteB2, plusB1, plusB2, or false. Twist replaces some items with JA items. Lite adds options for JA items. Plus requires JA items. Options with A have adjusted rewards. Options with B have vanilla rewards (unadjusted). Option 1 is for raspberry (available starting in year 2). Option 2 is for wasabi root.
MainPantrySummerCrops.AllowValues: twistA1, twistA2, liteA1, liteA2, plusA1, plusA2, twistB1, twistB2, liteB1, liteB2, plusB1, plusB2, false
